title: The Contract
creator_credit: David Ogilvy, Australian Film Commission and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
brief_description: A poignant drama about an ageing couple’s determination to retain their independence and the frustration felt by their son and his young family as they deal with situation. Stars Norma Kaye and Bunny Brooke.
creator_credit_for_label: David Ogilvy, Australian Film Commission and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
